# sass-math

[![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/sass-math.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/js/sass-math)

Sass math functions.

## Usage

```bash
npm install sass-math
```

```sass
@import 'node_modules/sass-math/math';

// pi()
// pow($number, $exp)
// fact($number)
// rad($angle)
// sin($angle)
// cos($angle)
// tan($angle)
```
